message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you first at a price of $20,000. I believe it offers significant value, and I'm happy to answer any questions you may have.
I'm interested in the product, but I think it's a bit pricey. I'd like to make a counteroffer of $12,000. I believe that's a fair price considering the value it offers.
Thanks for your interest, Bob. I understand your perspective on the price.  While $20,000 represents the product's true value, I'm willing to come down to $17,000.  This is my final offer.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. However, $17,000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $14,000. I think this is a fair compromise considering the value the product offers.
